General.Name: Gansu Golden Glass Technologies Co Ltd
General.Description: Gansu Golden Solar Co., Ltd research, develops, designs, manufactures, sells, and installs building glasses in China and internationally. The company offers security glass products, such as fireproof windows; aluminum alloy and plastic-steel fire-resistant windows; plastic fire-resistant energy-saving windows; alloy fire-resistant windows; and aluminum alloys, as well as refractory and diamond refractory energy-saving windows. It also provides fireproof glass system products that include steel fire-resistant glass and partition walls; heat-insulating steel glass doors and partition walls; stainless steel fire-resistant glass doors and windows, and partition walls; steel energy-saving fire-resistant windows; fire-resistant glass curtain walls; unitized fire-resistant glass curtain walls; and steel and aluminum system monolithic low-E coated fire-resistant glass. The company offers explosion-proof glass system, which include explosion-proof door system, King Kong security warehouse, and fire-proof and explosion-proof subway shielding system. In addition, it provides solar cells and photovoltaic modules. The company's products are used in large-scale public building facilities such as train stations, airports, gymnasiums, subways, high-end commercial office buildings and landmark buildings, and high-rise residential buildings. The company was formerly known as Gansu Jingang Solar Co., Ltd and changed its name to Gansu Golden Solar Co., Ltd in May 2023. The company was founded in 1994 and is headquartered in Suzhou, China.
